articles.description: Social media giant Facebook is rolling out an update to its apps that will make video calling easier than before.
articles.content:
Facebook has released a new feature to its Facebook and Messenger app in a move to make its video-conferencing tool more attractive.
Like Zoom, Messenger Rooms would make video calls joinable by anyone with a link.

articles.title: iPhone SE vs. iPhone 11 comparison: Which new iPhone should you buy? - CNET
articles.description: Apple's iPhone SE for 2020 is $300 cheaper than the baseline iPhone 11. Here's what you get (and don't get) for that price.
articles.content: Apple announced its latest iPhone SE for 2020 on April 15, with the aim to court budget-minded phone users who may not be able to splurge on $1,000 handsets like the iPhone 11 Pro or Galaxy S20. As the sequel to 2016's sleeper-hit iPhone of the same name, the… [+8282 chars]
